resources.string:
1- Go to Settings >> Bluetooth >> add new device, and add pair the HC-06 module

 2- Open the robotic arm controller app


3 - Click on the "Connect BT" button to display the list of paired Bluetooth devices devices


4- Select your device


5- use the joysticks to control the arm and the slider to control the grip

by makowildcat and partially funded by Black Artick and NSERC.
